events.message: I recently received my order but the item is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request to return the item and receive money back has been categorized under refund.
Support agent Mary Johnson has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello! This is Mary from support. I understand you'd like to return your item and get a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the reason for the return to process the refund efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The reason for return is that the product doesn’t match the description on the website.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process and you will receive your money back within 5 to 7 business days after we receive the returned item.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund.
The refund request has been logged and the return instructions sent. We consider the issue resolved on our end.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since you have confirmed receipt of your refund, we are now closing your case. Thank you for contacting support.
